title: ABCNews.com
desc: Includes American and world news headlines, articles, chatrooms, message boards, news alerts, video and audio webcasts, shopping, and wireless news service. As well as ABC television show information and content.

title: Al Arabiya News Channel
desc: Arabic-language news network. Breaking news and features along with videos, photo galleries and In-Focus sections on major news topics.  (Arabic, English, Persian, Urdu)

title: Aljazeera
desc: English version of the Arabic-language news network. Breaking news and features plus background material including profiles and global reactions.

title: AOL News
desc: Breaking news from around the world and in-depth coverage of current issues.

title: AP: Top Headlines
desc: Breaking news from the Associated Press.

title: Associated Press
desc: Wire service. Features breaking news and special reports.

title: BBC News
desc: United Kingdom and international news headlines. Contains video and audio webcasts, forums, and in-depth articles.

title: BBC News
desc: United Kingdom and international news headlines.

title: BBC News: News Front Page: World Edition
C-SPAN
desc: Coverage with videos and transcripts of Congress, politics, book and American history. Includes online resources.

title: CBC News
desc: Canadian and international headlines, articles, wireless services, e-mail digests, and live internet radio. [English or French]

title: CBS News
desc: US and international news. Features broadcasts, breaking news, and special reports.

title: Christian Science Monitor
desc: News and analysis from national newspaper. U.S.

title: CNN - Cable News Network
desc: Includes US and international stories and analysis, weather, video clips, and program schedule.

title: CNN: Recent Updates
desc: Coverage of the latest stories, weather, entertainment, and politics.

title: CNN: Top Stories
desc: Feed of the top stories from CNN.

title: The Conversation
desc: In-depth analysis, research, news and ideas from leading academics and researchers, offering informed commentary and debate on the issues affecting the world. Includes a Plain English guide to the latest developments and discoveries from the university and research sector.

title: CTV News
desc: Canadian television network's headline news, reports, videos, and blogs.

title: Deutsche Welle
desc: News, information and analysis of German and European topics. Free radio and television content on DW-Radio and DW-TV, streaming, on-demand or as podcasts.

title: The Economist
desc: Authoritative weekly newspaper focusing on international politics and business news and opinion.

title: Euronews
desc: International news from a European perspective. In eight languages.

title: Fox News Channel
desc: Offers worldwide news coverage, analysis, show profiles, broadcast schedules, team biographies, and email news alerts.

title: France 24
desc: Offering a French perspective on world events. Multilingual  broadcast in French, English, and Arabic.

title: Google News
desc: Aggregated headlines and a search engine of many of the world's news sources.

title: Google News
desc: Aggregated headlines from many of the world's news sources.

title: The Guardian
desc: Home of the Guardian, Observer and Guardian Weekly newspapers plus special-interest web sites. Each includes news, comment and features plus breaking news, multimedia, ongoing special reports and free archives.

title: The Guardian
desc: How to set up standard and combination RSS feeds by subject, journalist or type.

title: The Huffington Post
desc: Offers syndicated columnists, blogs and news stories with moderated comments.

title: McClatchy Washington Bureau
desc: Ongoing reports and special series about important world issues.

title: NBC News
desc: Breaking news online including US and world news.

title: New York Times
desc: Online edition of the newspaper's news and commentary.

title: News.com.au
desc: News from Australia and the world, featuring national, world, business, sport, entertainment and technology news from News Limited's resources and newspapers.

title: News.com.au: Top Stories
desc: Australian and international headline news and feature reports.

title: NPR: News
desc: US National Public Radio audio broadcast and text news stories and commentaries.

title: PBS News
desc: Portal for all news programs and coverage from the US Public Broadcasting Service.

title: Reuters
desc: Breaking news, business, financial and investing articles from around the globe. Also provides technology solutions.

title: Reuters - RSS Feeds
desc: RSS feeds by topic, market, sector, blogger, and video.

title: RTÉ News
desc: Updated daily news service provided by the Irish broadcaster, including audio and video downloads.

title: Spiegel Online
desc: English language international edition of the German news source also includes in-depth special reports, weblog and summaries of what the other German papers are saying.

title: Spiegel Online
desc: News and POV from Europe's largest newsmagazine.

title: The Times
desc: Includes the newspaper edition, breaking news, archives and special collections of articles.

title: Topix
desc: News from thousands of sources, sorted geographically for US cities, as well as a wide variety of subjects.

title: UN News Centre
desc: Official site for daily UN news, press releases, statements, briefings and calendar of events. Includes UN radio, video, webcasts, magazines, documents, publications, conference information, photos and additional information resources.

title: UN News Centre: Top Stories
desc: Articles and breaking news from the United Nations.

title: USA Today: Top Stories
desc: Headline news and articles from the newspaper.

title: VOA News: Top Stories
desc: Headline news from the Voice of America.

title: web62.com
desc: Online TV from Germany offering video streams and articles on a variety of topics.

title: Wikinews
desc: Free-content online news source where any site visitor can add or edit stories.

title: World News Network
desc: Aggregating news service for news by region and topic including business, sport and entertainment.

title: Yahoo News
desc: Daily news and full coverage of current issues.

title: Yahoo! News: Top Stories
desc: Daily news and full coverage of current issues.
